What is the difference between inline CSS, embedded CSS, and external CSS?
data.answer: Inline CSS is placed inside the HTML document, embedded CSS is placed outside the `<head>` tag, and external CSS is placed in a separate file.
data.a: Inline CSS is placed outside the HTML document, embedded CSS is placed inside the `<head>` tag,and external CSS is placed in a separate file.
data.b: Inline CSS is placed inside the HTML document, embedded CSS is placed inside the `<head>` tag,and external CSS is placed in a separate file.
data.c: Inline CSS is placed inside the HTML document, embedded CSS is placed outside the `<head>` tag, and external CSS is placed in a separate file.
data.d: Inline CSS is placed inside the HTML document, embedded CSS is placed inside the `<head>` tag,and external CSS is placed in the same file.
